verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: praised] [ARG1: Kentucky native and CIA director nominee Gina Haspel] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARGM-CAU: for being " too tough on terrorists] "
President Donald Trump praised [ARG1: Kentucky native and CIA director nominee Gina Haspel] on Monday for [V: being] " [ARG2: too tough on terrorists] "
